headline: Illinois Tool Works (ITW): A Fresh Look at Valuation After Recent Share Price Decline
summary: Illinois Tool Works (ITW) shares have slipped about 6% over the past month, catching the eye of investors who are wondering what might be driving recent price movement. With performance softening, comparisons to the broader market are becoming more pressing. See our latest analysis for Illinois Tool Works. After a strong multi-year run, Illinois Tool Works has seen momentum fade lately, with a 1-year total shareholder return of -2.9% despite substantial 3-year and 5-year gains. The recent...
